item.title: The Rider and the Elephant
item.description: The reason why I’ve chosen the image of a man on the back of an elephant as the logo for this blog is not something accidental. When I read this analogy for the first time, it seemed like a comparison that, in addition to being simple, was quite useful for explaining and dealing with certain everyday situations. It was in the book “Superpowers for normal people” by Mago More, (who in turn extracted it from another author).
